title: The Illustrated Book of Myths: Tales & Legends of the World
description: Vivid retellings convey the spirit of the original tales.   Full-color illustrations evoke the atmosphere of each myth and bring the stories to life.  Color photographs illustrate the cultural background of the world's mythologies.  A who's who of gods and goddesses, including the Greek and Norse pantheons, introduces important characters.  A source of inspiration and delight for the whole family.
author: Neil Philip
